00002  * intraFont.h
00003  * This file is used to display the PSP's internal font (pgf and bwfon firmware files)

00020 #include "libccc.h"
00021 
00026 #define INTRAFONT_ADVANCE_H        0x00000000 //default: advance horizontaly from one char to the next
00027 #define INTRAFONT_ADVANCE_V        0x00000100
00028 #define INTRAFONT_ALIGN_LEFT       0x00000000 //default: left-align the text
00029 #define INTRAFONT_ALIGN_CENTER     0x00000200
00030 #define INTRAFONT_ALIGN_RIGHT      0x00000400
00031 #define INTRAFONT_ALIGN_FULL       0x00000600 //full justify text to width set by intraFontSetTextWidth()
00032 #define INTRAFONT_SCROLL_LEFT      0x00002000 //in intraFontPrintColumn if text does not fit text is scrolled to the left 
00033                                                   //(requires redrawing at ~60 FPS with x position returned by previous call to intraFontPrintColumn())
00034 #define INTRAFONT_SCROLL_SEESAW    0x00002200 //in intraFontPrintColumn if text does not fit text is scrolled left and right
00035 #define INTRAFONT_SCROLL_RIGHT     0x00002400 //in intraFontPrintColumn if text does not fit text is scrolled to the right
00036 #define INTRAFONT_SCROLL_THROUGH   0x00002600 //in intraFontPrintColumn if text does not fit text is scrolled through (to the left)
00037 #define INTRAFONT_WIDTH_VAR        0x00000000 //default: variable-width
00038 #define INTRAFONT_WIDTH_FIX        0x00000800 //set your custom fixed witdh to 24 pixels: INTRAFONT_WIDTH_FIX | 24 
00039                                               //(max is 255, set to 0 to use default fixed width, this width will be scaled by size)
00040 #define INTRAFONT_ACTIVE           0x00001000 //assumes the font-texture resides inside sceGuTex already, prevents unecessary reloading -> very small speed-gain                                                                           
00041 #define INTRAFONT_CACHE_MED        0x00000000 //default: 256x256 texture (enough to cache about 100 chars)
00042 #define INTRAFONT_CACHE_LARGE      0x00004000 //512x512 texture(enough to cache all chars of ltn0.pgf or ... or ltn15.pgf or kr0.pgf)
00043 #define INTRAFONT_CACHE_ASCII      0x00008000 //try to cache all ASCII chars during fontload (uses less memory and is faster to draw text, but slower to load font)
00044                                               //if it fails: (because the cache is too small) it will automatically switch to chache on-the-fly with a medium texture
00045                                                                               //if it succeeds: (all chars and shadows fit into chache) it will free some now unneeded memory
00046 #define INTRAFONT_CACHE_ALL        0x0000C000 //try to cache all chars during fontload (uses less memory and is faster to draw text, but slower to load font)
00047                                               //if it fails: (because the cache is too small) it will automatically switch to chache on-the-fly with a large texture
00048                                                                                   //if it succeeds: (all chars and shadows fit into chache) it will free some now unneeded memory
00049 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_ASCII     (0x00010000*CCC_CP000)  //default: interpret strings as ascii text (ISO/IEC 8859-1)
00050 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_CP437     (0x00010000*CCC_CP437)  //interpret strings as ascii text (codepage 437)
00051 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_CP850     (0x00010000*CCC_CP850)  //interpret strings as ascii text (codepage 850)
00052 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_CP866     (0x00010000*CCC_CP866)  //interpret strings as ascii text (codepage 866)
00053 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_SJIS      (0x00010000*CCC_CP932)  //interpret strings as shifted-jis (used for japanese)
00054 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_GBK       (0x00010000*CCC_CP936)  //interpret strings as GBK (used for simplified chinese)
00055 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_KOR       (0x00010000*CCC_CP949)  //interpret strings as Korean codepage 949
00056 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_BIG5      (0x00010000*CCC_CP950)  //interpret strings as BIG5 (used for traditional chinese)
00057 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_CP1251    (0x00010000*CCC_CP1251) //interpret strings as ascii text (codepage windows-1251)
00058 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_CP1252    (0x00010000*CCC_CP1252) //interpret strings as ascii text (codepage windows-1252)
00059 #define INTRAFONT_STRING_UTF8      (0x00010000*CCC_CPUTF8) //interpret strings as UTF-8
00060 
00062 #define FILETYPE_PGF      0x00
00063 #define FILETYPE_BWFON    0x01
00064 #define PGF_BMP_H_ROWS    0x01
00065 #define PGF_BMP_V_ROWS    0x02
00066 #define PGF_BMP_OVERLAY   0x03
00067 #define PGF_NO_EXTRA1     0x04
00068 #define PGF_NO_EXTRA2     0x08
00069 #define PGF_NO_EXTRA3     0x10
00070 #define PGF_CHARGLYPH     0x20
00071 #define PGF_SHADOWGLYPH   0x40 //warning: this flag is not contained in the metric header flags and is only provided for simpler call to intraFontGetGlyph - ONLY check with (flags & PGF_CHARGLYPH)
00072 #define PGF_CACHED        0x80
00073 #define PGF_WIDTH_MASK    0x000000FF
00074 #define PGF_OPTIONS_MASK  0x00003FFF
00075 #define PGF_ALIGN_MASK    0x00000600
00076 #define PGF_SCROLL_MASK   0x00002600
00077 #define PGF_CACHE_MASK    0x0000C000
00078 #define PGF_STRING_MASK   0x00FF0000

00086 typedef struct {
00087         unsigned short x;         //in pixels
00088         unsigned short y;         //in pixels
00089         unsigned char width;      //in pixels
00090         unsigned char height;     //in pixels
00091         char left;                //in pixels
00092         char top;                 //in pixels
00093         unsigned char flags;
00094         unsigned short shadowID;  //to look up in shadowmap
00095         char advance;             //in quarterpixels
00096         unsigned long ptr;        //offset 
00097 } Glyph;
00098 
00099 typedef struct {
00100         unsigned short x;         //in pixels
00101         unsigned short y;         //in pixels
00102         unsigned char flags;
00103 } GlyphBW;
00104 
00110 typedef struct {
00111         unsigned short header_start;
00112         unsigned short header_len;
00113         char pgf_id[4];
00114         unsigned long revision;
00115         unsigned long version;
00116         unsigned long charmap_len;
00117         unsigned long charptr_len;
00118         unsigned long charmap_bpe;
00119         unsigned long charptr_bpe;
00120         unsigned char junk00[21];
00121         unsigned char family[64];
00122         unsigned char style[64];
00123         unsigned char junk01[1];
00124         unsigned short charmap_min;
00125         unsigned short charmap_max;
00126         unsigned char junk02[50];
00127         unsigned long fixedsize[2];
00128         unsigned char junk03[14];
00129         unsigned char table1_len;
00130         unsigned char table2_len;
00131         unsigned char table3_len;
00132         unsigned char advance_len;
00133         unsigned char junk04[102];
00134         unsigned long shadowmap_len;
00135         unsigned long shadowmap_bpe;
00136         unsigned char junk05[4];
00137         unsigned long shadowscale[2];
00138         //currently no need ;
00139 } PGF_Header;

00144 typedef struct intraFont {
00145         char* filename;
00146         unsigned char fileType;          
00147         unsigned char* fontdata;
00148         
00149         unsigned char* texture;          
00150         unsigned int texWidth;           
00151         unsigned int texHeight;          
00152         unsigned short texX;
00153         unsigned short texY;
00154         unsigned short texYSize;
00155         
00156         unsigned short n_chars;
00157         char advancex;                   
00158         char advancey;                   
00159         unsigned char charmap_compr_len; 
00160         unsigned short* charmap_compr;   
00161         unsigned short* charmap;         
00162         Glyph* glyph;                    
00163         GlyphBW* glyphBW;
00164                 
00165         unsigned short n_shadows;
00166         unsigned char shadowscale;       
00167         Glyph* shadowGlyph;              
00169         float size;
00170         unsigned int color;
00171         unsigned int shadowColor;
00172         unsigned int options;
00173 
00174         struct intraFont* altFont;
00175 } intraFont;
